LanguageData.VME_IdeoRole_FireKeeper.label: fire keeper
LanguageData.VME_IdeoRole_FireKeeper.description: A keeper of sacred flame whose primary job is to control pyres, bonfires, and kilns. Respected unanimously by their disciples, they have no qualms extinguishing fires and followers will respect their decisions to do so. All Firekeepers possess the ability to ignite flame sources and cause an explosion.
